title: Future Returns: There’s Still Opportunity in Emerging Market Stocks
text:
Emerging markets investors can’t take it anymore. For two months they’ve been bailing out of mutual funds and ETFs, taking cover from what has been a stomach-wrenching stretch of volatility and uncertainty about the stability of the global economy.

The fact remains, however, that emerging market stocks continue to be an important asset class for investors who want to maintain a diversified long-term portfolio. That’s investing 101. But how should investors reconcile that basic lesson with their impulse to flee and wait for...
description: Lazard Asset Management’s James Donald on why it’s important to keep a foot in the door, even in turbulent times
